Just recently saw this movie and I gotta say, honestly underwhelmed by it. It's not a horrible movie just average at best. Might have turned out better if they instead split this movie into two, one focusing on the past and what caused the Eternals to split and go their separate ways, the other focused on the re-emergence of Deviants. It'd give proper time for us to know them as characters in the first movie, then they could establish that sentient Deviant as a proper villain in the second movie and make him feel like more of a threat.
Honestly not a good movie but not a bad movie. Definitely enjoyable
This movie is too overhated, it wasn't the best but it wasn't the worst
For me I rate it 5.5 out of 10
It was alright. Imo one of the better phase 4 marvel movies.
I saw the movie, it's not the best or the worst but I enjoyed the humor

I watched Eternals on disney plus. Not as bad as people say it is. I def think there's worse marvel movies out there. I loved how unique and informative this movie was for the entire MCU, although in overall, I don't think the movie was amazing.
Nice scenery, good music, no Story. It was ok.
Watched it on a flight today. A very mediocre movie. It wasn't bad, but I can't say that I enjoyed it either. Definitely underwhelming for a Marvel flick and most characters were forgettable.
